item.description: Looks like perfect Saturday to hang with scooter buds, eat great food, take photos and most of all feel the wind between my fingers! I'd start earlier, but I must change my oil before this ride. At 4200 miles, I'm really pushing it. So hopefully I can get that out of the way and we can beat the lunch crowd ar kimballs in Westford. During lunch we can decide where to go - I'm in favor of carving, - knowing exactly where I am though having never been there before. See you there! Paul
item.how_to_find_us: Let's try to all park together
item.name: Chomp & Romp
